StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMediaCardsByRecruiterID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RecruiterID uniqueiden..er
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT DISTINCT mc.*, msz.*, ms.*, msr.SectorID, msr.Recrui.ngPersonId, mc2.*, case when mc2.MediaCardId is null then 0 else 1 end as NextFyCard FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].MediaCard mc INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON SUBSTRING(mc.Zip_Code,1,5) = msz.Zip INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms ON msz.SectorID = ms.SectorID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr ON msz.SectorID = msr.SectorID LEFT JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].MediaCard mc2 on mc.MediaName = mc2.MediaName and mc2.FY = mc.FY + 1 WHERE msr.Recrui.ngPersonId = @RecruiterID
END
